text: Per Roger Voigt (born 12 February 1931) is a Norwegian ice hockey player, born in Oslo, Norway. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1952, where the Norwegian team placed 9th. He is the father of Marius Voigt. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1931 births Category:Frisk Asker Ishockey players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Living people Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Per Voigt
